assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: PCC Rokita SA manufactures and distributes chemical products in Poland and internationally. The company offers chlorine and alkali; polyurethanes; specialty products; and surfactants products, as well as polyols, naphthalene, and phosphorus derivatives. It serves agrochemicals, adhesives, industrial cleaning and washing, detergents, paints and varnishes, tanning, glues, cosmetics and personal hygiene products, vehicle washing and care, chemical reagents, textiles, extraction and production, packaging, firefighting, construction, pulp and paper, refrigeration and household appliances, energy, pharmaceutical, furniture, metallurgical, fuel, food, mining, sport and recreation, chemical raw material and intermediates, lubricating and industrial fluids, fiber optic technologies, transport, printing inks, plastics, and water and waste water treatment industries. The company is based in Brzeg Dolny, Poland. PCC Rokita SA is a subsidiary of PCC SE.
